alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Saline and west central Pulaski Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Williams Junction, or 11 miles northeast of Hot Springs Village, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Salem in Saline County... Chenal Valley... Avilla... Congo... Paron... Grape... Bland... Reform... Ferndale... Natural Steps... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
